item.title: Building a Healthy Work Culture: Overcoming Office Politics in the Tech Sector
item.description: Office politics is an unavoidable aspect of corporate life, and the tech sector is no exception. While many software engineers and tech professionals assume that their skills and hard work will speak for themselves, the reality is that workplace dynamics, hidden power structures, and interpersonal relationships often play a significant role in career growth and job satisfaction. However, office po
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Surviving the Corporate Ladder: How Software Engineers Can Manage Workplace Politics
item.description: In the world of software engineering, technical expertise is essential — but it's not the only thing that determines success. Many software engineers assume that their skills alone will help them climb the corporate ladder, only to find themselves stuck while others, sometimes less technically skilled, move ahead. The reason? Workplace politics. Managing workplace dynamics is just as cru
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
